item.value: package day0205;\R\Rimport java\.util\.Scanner;\R\Rpublic class 스도쿠검증 \{\R\R\tpublic static void main\(String\[\] args\) \{\R\t\tScanner scan = new Scanner\(System\.in\);\R\t\tint testcase = scan\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\tfor\(int t=1; t<=10; \+\+t\)\R\t\t\{\R\t\t\tint ans = 0;\R\t\t\tint \[\]\[\] arr = new int\[9\]\[9\];\R\t\t\tfor\(int i=0; i<9; \+\+i\)\R\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\tarr\[i\]\[j\] = scan\.nextInt\(\);\R\t\t\tboolean flag = true;\R\t\t\t//가로검사\R\t\t\tint\[\] count = new int\[9\];\R\t\t\t\R\t\t\tif\(flag\)\R\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\tfor\(int i=0; i<9; \+\+i\)\R\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\+\+count\[arr\[i\]\[j\]\];\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\tif\(count\[j\] != 1\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\tflag = false;\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\tbreak;\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\tcount\[j\] = 0;\R\t\t\t\t\}\t\R\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\R\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\tcount\[j\] = 0;\R\t\t\t\R\t\t\t//세로검사\R\t\t\tif\(flag\)\R\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\tfor\(int i=0; i<9; \+\+i\)\R\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\+\+count\[arr\[j\]\[i\]\];\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0; j<9; \+\+j\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\tif\(count\[j\] != 1\)\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\{\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\tflag = false;\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\tbreak;\R\t\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\t\}\R\t\t\t\t\tfor\(int j=0;
